title: Digital Authoring
text: Currently working on the development of web apps to enhance the company's customer service. Technlogies that I'm using: Vue.js, Strapi (Nodejs), API Rest, LiteDB. In charge of the digitization processes within the department. Creating automated processes with Microsoft Power Automate.

title: Field service technician
text: Installation of X-ray machines, dynamic weighers, metal detectors... Machinery maintenance, customer training, IQ/OQ execution. Traveling across Spain and Europe.

title: Field service technician
text: Assembly, adjustment and comissioning of industrial machinery. Mechanical and electrical work. After-sales service. International travel.
